1.0.name: wordpress/addthis-analytics-wp
1.0.description:
Display data avaiable from the AddThis.com Analytics API in the sidebar of your site.

Multiple widgets can displayed on a page with customisable titles.

There is a widget interface to allow you to choose which data to share. The data is output in a table with CSS classes to hook styling to your data.

Future improvements will include the introduction of integration with Google Charts API or a similar charting library.
